prompt: Create an SEO-optimized product name (50-60 chars). Include key terms: {context.get('tema', '')} {context.get('color', '')}. Focus on searchability.
Create a compelling meta description (150-160 chars) focusing on: {context.get('tema', '')} {context.get('color', '')}
Generate an SEO-friendly URL (max 50 chars) using: {context.get('tema', '')}-{context.get('color', '')}. Use hyphens, lowercase.
